title: Device meets all specifications says its not compatible
body: I have a sony experia Z3(D5803) that is updated to android 5.1.1 as far as ive seen only requirement for the app to work is 4.1.1 pls help...

replies.body: PS It should be out now for South Africa, let me know if you have any other problems!
Hi thanks i just downloaded it ;)

Ignored? Never! I read all of the mobile app boards topics. :DD 

I've seen a lot of people confused by the generic Google "device incompatible" message because it displays that for unreleased countries as well. Yes, the app isn't yet available for South Africa but will be very soon. We're still in the process of finishing our global rollout.  :)

Little more info needed :) 

What country are you trying to download the app in? 
Which Play Store link did you use?
Oh wow sorry i assumed my post would get ignored... I just googled league friends and went to the playstore link that came up, and im in South Africa could my country be the issue?
